title: Dom Phillips and Bruno Pereira: Suspect admits shooting missing Amazon pair, Brazil police say
content:
1. Dom Phillips and Bruno Pereira: Suspect admits shooting missing Amazon pair, Brazil police say  BBC
  2. Suspect admits killing missing pair in Brazilian Amazon, authorities say  CNN
  3. Brazil police arrest two in case of missing journalist  Reuters
  4. Man confesses to killing Dom Phillips and Bruno Pereira in Amazon, Brazil police say  The Washington Post
  5. Second suspect arrested over missing pair as Brazil's UK ambassador apologizes to family for incorrect claims  CNN
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ドム・フィリップスとブルーノ・ペレイラ：容疑者がアマゾンの行方不明の2人を撃ったことを認めるとブラジル警察が発表した。
巴西警方称，多姆-菲利普斯和布鲁诺-佩雷拉：嫌疑人承认向失踪的亚马逊夫妇开枪。
巴西警方稱，多姆-菲利普斯和布魯諾-佩雷拉：嫌疑人承認向失蹤的亞馬遜夫婦開槍。
